com.example.hbaltz.aton.polygon

Class Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.hbaltz.aton.polygon.Line

  • public class Line
extends java.lang.Object
    Line is defined by starting point and ending point on 2D dimension.

      • isInside

        public boolean isInside(Point point)
        Indicate whereas the point lays on the line.
        Parameters:
        point - - The point to check
        Returns:
        True if the point lays on the line, otherwise return False

      • isVertical

        public boolean isVertical()
        Indicate whereas the line is vertical.
        For example, line like x=1 is vertical, in other words parallel to axis Y.
        In this case the A is (+/-)infinite.
        Returns:
        True if the line is vertical, otherwise return False
